verses.text: And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \add who was\add* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H8453"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* whom I \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, there shall not be \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* nor \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* these \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, but \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to my \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 17.1 \ft Elijah: Heb. Elijahu: Gr. Elias\f*
And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Get|strong="H3212"\w* thee hence, and \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* thee \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* thyself by the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Cherith|strong="H3747"\w*, that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

And it shall be, \add that\add* thou shalt \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*; and I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* to \w feed|strong="H3557"\w* thee there.

So he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according unto the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* by the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Cherith|strong="H3747"\w*, that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

And the \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*; and he \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*.

And it came to pass \w after|strong="H7093"\w* a \w while|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, because there had been no \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 17.7 \ft after…: Heb. at the end of days\f*
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w get|strong="H3212"\w* thee to \w Zarephath|strong="H6886"\w*, which \add belongeth\add* to \w Zidon|strong="H6721"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there: behold, I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* there to \w sustain|strong="H3557"\w* thee.\f + \fr 17.9 \ft Zarephath: Gr. Sarepta\f*

So he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Zarephath|strong="H6886"\w*. And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w gate|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, behold, the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \add was\add* there \w gathering|strong="H7197"\w* of \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w*: and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to her, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fetch|strong="H3947"\w* me, I pray thee, a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, that I may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

And as she was \w going|strong="H3212"\w* to \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add*, he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to her, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* me, I pray thee, a \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, I \w have|strong="H3426"\w* not a \w cake|strong="H4580"\w*, but an \w handful|strong="H4393"\w* of \w meal|strong="H7058"\w* in a \w barrel|strong="H3537"\w*, and a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* in a \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w*: and, behold, I \add am\add* \w gathering|strong="H7197"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w*, that I may go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w dress|strong="H6213"\w* it for me and my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, that we may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it, and \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not; \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as thou hast \w said|strong="H1697"\w*: but \w make|strong="H6213"\w* me \w thereof|strong="H8033"\w* a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w cake|strong="H5692"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \add it\add* unto me, and \w after|strong="H0314"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for thee and for thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, The \w barrel|strong="H3537"\w* of \w meal|strong="H7058"\w* shall not \w waste|strong="H3615"\w*, neither shall the \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w fail|strong="H2637"\w*, until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sendeth|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.  +  r 17.14  t sendeth: Heb. giveth *

And she \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to the \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*: and she, and he, and her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add many\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 17.15 \ft many…: or, a full year\f*

\add And\add* the \w barrel|strong="H3537"\w* of \w meal|strong="H7058"\w* \w wasted|strong="H3615"\w* not, neither did the \w cruse|strong="H6835"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w fail|strong="H2638"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*.\f + \fr 17.16 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

¶ And it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \add that\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, the \w mistress|strong="H1172"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, fell \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*; and his \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w* was \w so|strong="H3966"\w* \w sore|strong="H2389"\w*, that there was no \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* in him.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, What have I to do with thee, O thou \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? art thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me to \w call|strong="H2142"\w* my \w sin|strong="H5771"\w* to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*, and to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* me thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* him out of her \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and carried him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into a \w loft|strong="H5944"\w*, where he \w abode|strong="H3427"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* him upon his own \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

And he \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, hast thou also brought \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* upon the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* with whom I \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w*, by \w slaying|strong="H4191"\w* her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?

And he \w stretched|strong="H4058"\w* himself upon the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I pray thee, let this \w child’s|strong="H3206"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* into \w him|strong="H7130"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.  +  r 17.21  t stretched: Heb. measured *  +  r 17.21  t into…: Heb. into his inward parts *

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*; and the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* into \w him|strong="H7130"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and he \w revived|strong="H2421"\w*.

And \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, and brought him \w down|strong="H3381"\w* out of the \w chamber|strong="H5944"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him unto his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: and \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*.

¶ And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, Now by \w this|strong="H2088"\w* I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou \add art\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add and\add* that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add is\add* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.
